animal.question: I say 'meow'. I like milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I love to drink milk!
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I say 'woof woof'. I wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones!
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🚶‍♀️ I go for walks with people.

animal.question: I say 'baa'. I have wool. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat grass.
🐑 My wool can be used to make clothes.
👨‍🌾 Farmers keep me on a farm.

animal.question: I say 'quack'. I like to swim. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat plants and bugs.
🏞️ You can find me in a pond or lake.

animal.question: I say 'neigh'. I like to run. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 People can ride on my back.
🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🏞️ I live in a field or on a farm.

animal.question: I say 'oink'. I like to play in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐽 I have a curly tail.
🐷 Some people eat bacon that comes from me.
🏠 I live on a farm.

animal.question: I say 'moo'. I give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I'm a big animal!
🌾 I eat grass in a field.
🥛 People drink the white liquid I make.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am very big and grey.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I say 'cock-a-doodle-doo'. I lay eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐔 I have feathers and a beak.
🐛 I eat worms and seeds.
🍳 People eat my eggs for breakfast.

animal.question: I roar and I'm called the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I eat meat.
🌍 I live in Africa.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants love me!

weather.question: I am big, bright, and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🌞 I come out during the day.

weather.question: I move the trees and make kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I am air that moves.
🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 Kites need me to fly.

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines after rain.
🍀 Some people think there's gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a big, white, fluffy thing in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I float in the sky.
💧 I can be dark or white.
🌧️ I sometimes bring rain.

weather.question: I rumble and flash and sometimes scare people. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very loud.
🌩️ I happen during a storm.
🔦 I light up the sky very briefly.

weather.question: I am cold and icy and sometimes fall from the sky like rain, but harder. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms.
⚽ I am like tiny balls of ice.

weather.question: Sometimes I hide the sun and make it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I look like a cloud near the ground.
🚗 You have to drive carefully when I am around.
👻 I make things look blurry.

weather.question: I am a very strong wind that spins like a top. I can be dangerous. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have a funnel shape.
🏠 You should take cover if you see me.
💨 I can lift things off the ground.
